scripts.flatten: truffle-flattener ./contracts/MasterBalance.sol > ./contracts-flattened/MasterBalance.sol && truffle-flattener ./contracts/SupportBalance.sol > ./contracts-flattened/SupportBalance.sol && truffle-flattener ./contracts/BalanceToken.sol > ./contracts-flattened/BalanceToken.sol && truffle-flattener ./contracts/BalanceSplitBar.sol > ./contracts-flattened/BalanceSplitBar.sol && truffle-flattener ./contracts/Timelock.sol > ./contracts-flattened/Timelock.sol && truffle-flattener ./contracts/BNBRewardBalance.sol > ./contracts-flattened/BNBRewardBalance.sol
scripts.verify:bsc: truffle run verify MasterBalance --network bsc && truffle run verify SupportBalance --network bsc && truffle run verify BalanceToken --network bsc && truffle run verify Timelock --network bsc && truffle run verify BalanceSplitBar --network bsc
scripts.verify:testnet: truffle run verify MasterBalance --network testnet && truffle run verify SupportBalance --network testnet && truffle run verify BalanceToken --network testnet && truffle run verify Timelock --network testnet && truffle run verify BalanceSplitBar --network testnet
